title: Western | Oath of Vengeance (1944 film) Buster Crabbe, Falcon, Al St. John

sources.title: Western | Oath of Vengeance (1944 film) Buster Crabbe, Falcon, Al St. John
sources.description:
"Billy and "Fuzzy" face bullets and battles on the plains. Fuzzy gives up cowboy life after a calf drags him with his own lasso. He buys a store but struggles as customers pay by credit. Villains manipulate cattlemen and farmers, sparking a range war. Billy takes on the villains, cattlemen, and farmers to stop the chaos."


Original title: Oath of Vengeance (1944)


Director: Sam Newfield
Writer: Fred Myton
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Falcon, Al St. John
Genres: Colorized, Western


@CultCinemaClassics
